text:
Hello everyone my name is Heritage
I am a Graphic/Brand designer, Web designer, storyteller and content writer.

I am super stoked about building bridges between companies and their target markets through creative design and content. 
 
Having sufficient agency experience, I have worked with a number of brands; designing brand
collaterals, communications, and adverts, with the aim of maintaining their uniqueness across
several mediums, whilst getting their message across. I am super skilled in Adobe Creative Cloud, Tertiary Video Editing software and in building optimized landing pages.

I am open for work and ready to help hit your brands marketing goals and help you build an amazing brand voice. 

You can send me a mail at <mailto:stillinioluwa@gmail.com|stillinioluwa@gmail.com>

I am always open to conversations around brand growth and design. :rocket::rocket::rocket:
